description: This file contains shell script functions for checking process status, obtaining MAC address, syncing logs, handling system reboot, and retrieving system uptime. It also includes licensing information and sources external configuration files.

methods.name: processCheck
methods.description: Checks if a process with a given name is running and returns 1 if not, 0 if running.

methods.name: getMacAddress
methods.description: Retrieves the MAC address of the interface specified by the environment variable ESTB_INTERFACE.

methods.name: syncLog
methods.description: Synchronizes log files from temporary log paths to a persistent log directory.

methods.name: rebootFunc
methods.description: Handles system restart, including saving power state, syncing logs, backing up logs, and rebooting.
